content.prompt: What best describes the way the speaker feels?

choices.label: Sad that the flowers bloom for only a short time
Concerned about commercialization of Japanese traditions
Happy that people from around the world enjoy Japanese traditions
Excited to spend time celebrating at hanami events with friends

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
